feed.title: Fort Good Hope - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Good Hope
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 9:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -26.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -28.9°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
